javax.realtime
Class ScopedPhysicalMemory

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--javax.realtime.MemoryArea
        |
        +--javax.realtime.ScopedMemory
              |
              +--javax.realtime.ScopedPhysicalMemory
public class ScopedPhysicalMemory
extends ScopedMemory

An instance of ScopedPhysicalMemory allows objects to be allocated from a range of physical memory with particular attributes, determined by their "memoryType". This memory area has the same restrictive set of assignment rules as ScopedMemory memory areas.

create

public static ScopedPhysicalMemory create(java.lang.Object type,
                                          long base,
                                          long size)
Creates a ScopedPhysicalMemory.
Parameters:
type - An Object representing the type of memory required (e.g. dma, shared)
base - The physical memory address of the area.
size - The size of the area in bytes.
Returns:
A new ScopedPhysicalMemory
Throws:
java.lang.SecurityException - The application doesnâ€™t have permissions to access physical memory or the given range of memory.
OffsetOutOfBoundsException - The address is invalid.
SizeOutOfBoundsException - The size is negative or extends into an invalid range of memory.
UnsupportedPhysicalMemoryException - Thrown if the underlying hardware does not support the given type.

Set the physical memory factory to the given argument.
